desc: ３ターンの間、味方全体の状態異常を無効化する

dictionary.lore: By mixing the correct amount of Honor Drops,  Antidotes, and Holy Water, one can create this restorative medicine called a Nullifier. Embodied with a refined and elegant aroma, its special taste is difficult to put into words. However, since it is able to increase the body's resistance for a limited amount of time, even the most able of Summoners still like to have it on hand during dangerous situations, making the demand for this item very high.

name: 抗疫薬
